text: Bharat Chhikara sometimes Chikara (born 10 October 1985) is an Indian field hockey player who has played as a midfielder for the national team. He was part of the team that won the bronze medal at the 2010 Asian Games and silver medal at the 2010 Commonwealth Games. Chhikara played in 2019 for the institutional side Indian Oil Corporation (IOC). ==References== ==External links== *Player profile at indiahockey.net Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Indian male field hockey players Category:Field hockey players from Haryana Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in field hockey Category:Commonwealth Games silver medallists for India Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for India Category:Asian Games medalists in field hockey Category:Field hockey players at the 2010 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 2010 Asian Games Category:Field hockey players at the 2010 Commonwealth Games
title: Bharat Chhikara
